column3: You require another anima glass? Surely you jest, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>. I can see it right there in your hand.
I would gladly furnish you with another, but only if you are truly in need.
You misplaced the anima glass, you say?
That will not do at all. Thankfully, I have prepared several more at Lady Ulan's behest for just such an occasion.
Please do take care not to lose this one. I would rather not waste valuable time for research on fashioning more glass.
If you are certain you no longer require the glass, I will not question your decision.
Should you change your mind, however, you are always welcome to take one. As Lady Ulan is wont to misplace our supplies, I make a point to always keep a surplus on hand.
